TEXT: Once a dweller of the lofty ninth heaven—now fallen into the sea. NL Her hypersensitive body communes with the world, casting spells through the essence of pleasure—semen.
"You felt the call from a corrupted heart… and gave your love, long since decayed and depraved..."

She once reveled in decadent indulgence, but her kind, who defied nature itself, has since drowned in ruin. NL Now she chases desire with abandon, her soul rotting a little more with each exquisite sting.
"You felt the call from a corrupted heart… and gave your love, scarred and broken beyond repair..."
